Sidebar.description: Desktop-only vertical navigation. Collapsible. Contains logo, user profile summary, and main navigation links.
Sidebar.styling: w-64 h-screen bg-card border-l border-border fixed right-0 top-0 hidden md:flex flex-col z-50

BottomNav.description: Mobile-only horizontal navigation. Fixed at bottom. Contains 4-5 primary actions (Home, Clients, Chats, Menu). 'Menu' opens a drawer for other items.
BottomNav.styling: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-16 bg-card/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border flex justify-around items-center md:hidden z-50 safe-area-pb

DashboardCard.description: Standard container for widgets. Minimalist, dark background, subtle border.
DashboardCard.styling: bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm

DataTable.description: Responsive table. On mobile, transforms into a stack of cards for readability.

assets.logo: Use existing project logo or placeholder text 'Admin Portal'

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Initialize a React application structure if not present. Ensure 'lucide-react', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge' are installed.
2. MIGRATION: You are rewriting 'public/admin.html'. Extract all JavaScript logic (API calls, event listeners) and convert them into React Hooks (e.g., useClients, useSettings).
3. COMPATIBILITY: Maintain all 'id' and 'data-tab' attributes on the main wrapper elements of each page/section to ensure compatibility with any external scripts targeting them.
4. RTL: Ensure the <html> tag has dir='rtl'. Use logical properties (ms-*, me-*, ps-*, pe-*) where possible, or standard Tailwind classes knowing they will flip in RTL mode if configured correctly.
5. MOBILE FIRST: Design the mobile view first. Tables must become cards on mobile. Navigation moves to bottom.
6. THEME: Enforce the dark theme strictly. No white backgrounds. Use zinc-900/950 for backgrounds.
7. PERFORMANCE: Code split the heavy tabs (Charts, Tables) using React.lazy.
8. REWRITE: Do not copy-paste the old HTML. Rebuild the UI using the new Design System components while keeping the logic.
universal_guidelines: Use 'radix-ui' primitives for complex interactive components (Dialog, Dropdown, Tabs).
Avoid 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties (opacity, transform).
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
